hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #hearts#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the path of #the hero#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #12# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Boss Key# and #a Deku Stick#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Blue Rupee#.
